description: Amara Botanical Experience formulates natural cosmetic products and creates sensory experiences that reconnect individuals with nature. They emphasizes the use of locally sourced, organic ingredients, including plants grown on the island of San Andr√©s, to create products such as soaps, shampoos, and conditioners; aiming to promote wellness and environmental consciousness. By offering workshops and personalized consultations, Amara fosters a community focused on holistic health and the importance of natural ingredients in personal care.
name: Amara Botanical Experience
